title: Game-Based Mathematics Foundation Competency Enhancement Program for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of elementary and secondary-level mathematics fundamentals
context.additional_context: Program designed for adult learners aged 40+ familiar with smartphone-based game learning, enabling engaging acquisition of basic math concepts in time-constrained environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply fraction, ratio, and basic statistics concepts with over 80% accuracy through in-game tasks.
Learners sustain daily 15-minute math problem-solving activities for four weeks using a weekly mission system.
Learners enhance communication skills by collaboratively solving complex math problems with peers through in-game cooperative features.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
